content.rendered:
COVID-19 Safety Measures in Place.

Maple Parking take the security and safety of their staff and passengers very seriously. Approved by Trading Standards, every approved operator is required to demonstrate that their parking facilities meet planning and security requirements.

To help reduce the risk of infection and to keep both passenger and driver safe, we have introduced a number of additional precautions. We know social distancing isn’t always possible in an airport environment, but we ask you to keep a safe distance whenever you can.

The COVID-19 pandemic has had a significant impact on how we travel and we understand how important it is to offer you reassurance and in line with government guidelines we have taken extra measures to help customers:

  • All staff will be wearing masks at all times
  • Protective screening between masked staff and customer at meeting points
  • All staff will be wearing gloves at all times
  • All staff sanitising their gloves regularly and before each customer/vehicle interaction
  • Sanitising wipes given to every customer to wipe steering wheel and hand controls (for customer reassurance)
  • 2m distancing wherever possible between all staff and customers

If you have a booking and need to make changes, take a look at our latest Coronavirus update here.

Parking Points to Consider:

– Cars only, your car must fit into a standard sized car parking space (2.4m wide x 4.8m long)
– All car parks are fully monitored and secure at all times, car parks are re-assessed regularly to maintain the Park Mark award
– Please be sure to have your paperwork and or booking reference ready on arrival so that staff can identify you
– Please be sure that your vehicle has road tax, holds a valid MOT certificate and is roadworthy/legal
– Please allow sufficient time for the driver to complete the check-in procedure and conduct the necessary photographic vehicle inspection
